duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver garage doors for a long-standing dedicated customer with no slip seating.
Drive late model, Freightliner and Volvo trucks, Penske Truck Leasing trucks with best-in-class specs designed for comfort.
Follow all federal and/or state laws, regulations, and/or agency rules, standards and guidelines.
Maintain a regular, predictable, full attendance.
Work the required schedule, work at the specific location required, complete Penske employment application, and submit to a background investigation and drug screening.
